website_summaries.verdict: Anyone looking for a reliable organizer with a number of unique accessories will find their match in this bag.
pros: One large storage compartment with a magnetic close and three easy-to-reach exterior pockets
Organizer collapses for simple storage when not in use
cons: Only fits Britax strollers and a few other major stroller companies

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it 👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this Attachment. I love being able to have water and my phone, sunglasses etc right there. It looks a little awkward at first just hanging there but I got used to it very quickly. There is a metal bar around the top that keeps the shape of the product 🙏🏼🙏🏼🙏🏼. I'm using mine on a Britax Affinity and it works just fine with the seat facing in or out. The cup holders look small but they can hold at least a liter sized bottle! Which is typically the size of sparkling water (or wine...just kidding!!) There's plenty of storage in the accessory. I'm glad I got it when I ordered the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: nolaLady

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller organizer. Pretty basic, but fits well and the cup holders hold anything from a plastic water bottle to a yeti-- probably not anything bigger. On piece of advice, it does just attach with two loops, and it is a stroller, so if you are putting a takeout coffee cup or something without a lid in there, be care because it will slosh and spill out. Definetely not a reason not to buy!! That would happen with any organizer like this. I really like the middle magnetic pocket, it fits a lot. I also like the open mesh pockets in front of the drink inserts-- they are tight enough to hold keys or chapstock, etc.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyILM

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Baby Jogger City Mini GT Single!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after asking some ladies in a thrifty mom group about what non-Baby Jogger stroller organizer they have for the City Mini GT Single! I saw lots of reviews for the Select or Double, but not the Single, so I had a hard time choosing just looking through reviews. I'm really glad I purchased this because it's perfect for us! The coffee cups pictured are both Starbucks Grande cups so the depth is reassuring. I love that there's actually a metal frame structure so it feels sturdy, but we can still fold the stroller with the organizer on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mrs_and_mama

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, and I should have bought one sooner. The original pockets and so called "cup holders" on my stroller were awful, and I got this, and it's been amazing. I use my stroller every morning on my "power walk" with the baby. It holds- My huge "BUILT" brand water cup FULL of water/ice, my EarPods case, spare key w/ mace, kleenex, granola bar, small tube of sunscreen, hand sanitizer, and my cell phone in the front. It's super sturdy, and I have had zero regrets after buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Dana O

customer_reviews.title: Works on other strollers besides Britax, too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller organizer for my UppaBaby Vista stroller. After trying out the Diono organizer in the store (it felt like it was flimsy and would spill any drink I put in it) I decided I'd give this Britax organizer a try. It is so much better! The higher price is definitely justified. It's made of a much higher quality fabric and has a metal internal frame that keeps it sturdy. The straps that connect it to the stroller handle are wider too, which helps to keep it in place better. It fits perfectly on my Vista, and I do not have to remove it to fold the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love our Britax stroller but I was disappointed as a FTM that it didn’t come with a cup holder (I had no idea they don’t all have these!). Luckily, I was able to find a Britax one for a very affordable price. It keeps his bottles warm when needed, plus my coffee. I can toss my keys and whatever knickknacks inside it too!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my evenflo pivot series stroller and it fit! It’s a soft material so it seems unstable at first. I worried when I was putting my full drinks in it but I’ve had no problems with it! Why do strollers not come with enough drink holders anymore?? That’s the real question! Every time I purchase something online, I always check the reviews. I count on others to help me choose the best option. My reviews are always my honest opinion and I try to include photos if possible. If my review has helped you, please click the "helpful" button below, and if you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DianaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It makes me wonder why Britax doesn't just include it with their stroller package. I suppose to make the extra buck that they can. The insulated cup holders are great. I like the magnet-enclosed reinforced pouch for things like my keys, or pacifiers etc. The front mesh pouch works great to put my phone in. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: smag

customer_reviews.title: I have a Baby Jogger City Mini double and purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Baby Jogger City Mini double and purchased two of these Britax organizers based on other reviews. I also ordered the Baby Jogger version so I could see for myself. The Britax was much preferred. We used these in Disney and two organizers gave us 4 total cupholders which is what we needed for our family. I didn't want the belly bar and trays for the kids so their cups went in our console when needed. The Baby Jogger one only has one cupholder each. I also prefer the way the Britax attached and how installing two of them on my double fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing for a first time mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in November 2018 and we have just started using it as our baby was born in May 2019. We have been using our stroller for less than a month and the organizer is starting to tear already and to add to insult we have hardly even used the organizer/cup holder so it is not because of wear and tear. I would love for amazon or Britax to contact me because I would like my money back or a new product! Very disappointing for a first time mom.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Louise

customer_reviews.title: Using with Baby Jogger City Select
customer_reviews.text: We're using this product with our City Select and it's great. It can hold so much and I just wish I had grabbed one sooner! The middle section, with the magnetic closure, is big enough to accommodate my Note 8 and get it out of the elements if needed- otherwise, that section typically holds a bottle of sunscreen, hand sanitizer, rattle, dog bags, and a bag of dog treats, all with room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: SoDak

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended great
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been working as intended. Fits most cups but larger sized water bottles and or cups may not fit. The middle compartment is nice since it has a magnetic closure. It's also a decent size. I like this one much better than the cheaper brand option I had first. Velcro straps seem to be stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to stroller
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our Uppababy Vista, we get complements on it all the time. Holds most water bottles and has that hidden covered compartment in the middle where we carry personal stuff like cellphone and wallet without everyone to see. It also magnetically snaps shut without making noise, an issue with sleeping kids in the stroller. The velcro seems really strong and keeps it in its place on the stroller. We also haven't had to take it off to fold the stroller which is also nice. It was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: pinkfeet33

customer_reviews.title: Real Dad Experience: Comparison to Baby Jogger parent console
customer_reviews.text: I got this organizer for my Baby Jogger City Select. I bought a Baby Jogger parent console and returned it because the velcro folded in and interfere with the two holes. The Baby Jogger also has only one net pocket in the front while this Britax has three. The Baby Jogger is shorter making drinks stand up more and more chances of falling out. Seems like the Britax is a winner given all the deficiency to the Baby Jogger. But. The Baby Jogger velcro is much much stronger. It is really difficult to remove. The Britax velcro is too loose in comparison and when you put something in you hear the sound of the velcro coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Dad

customer_reviews.title: ... Uppababy's parent console are so poor- and it works great! Fits fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on our UppaBaby Vista stroller since the reviews for Uppababy's parent console are so poor- and it works great! Fits fine, with a little adjusting, and I love all the pockets and compartments. Have to make sure not to put a cup without a lid that is too full in it, as the organizer kind of swings/moves when pushing the stroller, especially on the road, and any liquids are bound to spill.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: Works well on many strollers
customer_reviews.text: This fits and functions well with our. Is easy to adjust how high the organizer rides with the velcro attachment tabs. We don't even have to take this organizer off to fold the stroller, which is a huge plus. The cup-holders work well on everything from a 12oz can to a tervis. Plenty of space in the middle compartment for 2 phones, keys, and the dog's leash when we get to the park.
customer_reviews.author: IrishXRT

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I love the cupholders and storage. The cupholders are deep and hold up a variety of bottles pretty good. No spills yet. The pocket is deep enough for a cell phone and a smaller wallet. If you have a larger wallet, it will not fit. Velcro holds up pretty good but it's easy to get off one stroller and move to the other one, if needed. We had one for our 1st baby, who is 3 now and we still use it. Just recently bought a second one for the new baby and I have no doubt it will last as long as our first one did. It's well built.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! It easily fits on all of my strollers and has 2 cup holders and a black for my phone. I usually have it on my Britax B Ready stroller, which for some reason has no cup holders on it at all when purchased. I was upset at first that such an expensive stroller needed other attachments, but I'm happy with the accessory itself. I would recommend to use with all strollers.
customer_reviews.author: kristin c.

customer_reviews.title: One of the few organizers that fit my strollers
customer_reviews.text: I have a Mamas and Papas Armadillo flip. I tried three organizers. This organizer and the Skip Hop organizer fit my stroller. I picked the Skip Hop over the Britax because I liked the shape of the cup holders and the open space between the two cup holders (Britax has a flap over that space). The Britax cup holders have a formed shaped, I like that the skip hop cup holders give me more flexibility. The open space between the two cup holders makes for easier access. I felt the flap on the Britax would get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Works with 2015 Uppababy Vista
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the 2015 Uppababy Vista, with the seat or with a car seat on it (we have a Cybex Aton Q and the maxi-cosi adapters). Mesh pockets on the front can hold change, tissues, splendas, etc. The cup holders can fit a venti Starbucks cup or a water bottle without hitting the handle. The center covered compartment can hold a phone or keys. I used it for trash, generally. Just be careful with hot drinks-- I wouldn't put one in there if your kid is rear-facing and has bare legs, just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: K. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Must have accessory for stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great accessory for any Britax stroller, we've used it on the B-Agile and B-Ready and it would probably work on most strollers from any brand. It's just velcro straps, we've loaded it up with two 1L bottles of water and it doesn't budge. In my opinion it would be crazy to own a Britax stroller and not have this accessory :) It's extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Borp

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my strollers, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute fav cup holder. It fits perfect on my BOB, city mini, Joovy and Maclaren. Perfect for fit for all. The cup holders are sturdy. Only eve have issue with a small cup of hot coffee but I just put a balled up napkin underneath for some height. If your stroller folds forward to close, the top magnetic part opens sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Masters

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Just received this product in the mail. I immediately attached it to our Britax 35 stroller system and am THRILLED with the outcome (see photos). It is durable, sturdy, and even fits my 30oz Hydro Flask water bottle in the middle section - with room for a coffee and a bottle! There is a pocket for keys, cell phone, etc. I folded up my stroller and it easily folded up with the set. I couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: and a pocket with a lid we love this. Both my husband and I can take ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish we had bought this sooner! I had no clue these things existed. With 2 cup holders, numerous pockets, and a pocket with a lid we love this. Both my husband and I can take a drink, our phones, snacks for the baby, and the baby's water cup and now have to carry a thing! It holds up well and you don't have to take it off when you fold down the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: 26summer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a three months
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Britax stroller caddy. The first one lasted over two years before really showing wear and tear. I replaced it in April. By July, the velcro on the straps the new one had ripped so badly it would not longer hold. The use, wear and tear on the new one was normal and no different than before. Not sure if Britax changed materials or what but this was a waste of money apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Must-have item!
customer_reviews.text: This has been on my britax stroller for over a year. We love having some place for sippy cups/drinks. The little storage compartment is great for my keys when we go for walks. It is definitely a must-have item for your stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and function
customer_reviews.text: Fits our Britax B-Agile single stroller well. The velcro straps secure well to the angled handlebar. Plenty of room for two cups, cell phone, sunglasses, and I love the strong magnetic closure center space!
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't swing on the stroller handles and is the perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is so handy! We use it on our double stroller (City Mini Double GT). I was afraid it would be way too small or swing when we had water bottles in it and that's not the case at all! It is the perfect size and is so handy. I love the center pocket. We have a Valco Jogger as our single stroller that we got back in 2013. I can't believe I never thought to get one of these! I was always so jealous of my friends that had organizers built into their strollers and I didn't even know you could buy parent consoles like this. Now I can switch it between strollers! Super handy!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jae

customer_reviews.title: great addition for stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great holder that attaches easily to the stroller, since the stroller itself doesn't come with something to hold cups or anything. It has two cup holders, a magnetic pocket in the middle with a cover (great for wallet) and 3 mesh pockets in the front. These are great for phones or keys. They only thing I could complain about is that it doesn't hang straight really, it rests on canopy of the stroller. But the angle isn't horrible. Once you get a bottle of water in there, it weighs it down a little. The material is also sturdy, no wimpy material which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mama’s things together - and out of sight/mind of kids
customer_reviews.text: We have a britax b ready stroller and this attaches perfectly to the handles. The middle pocket has a magnet that keeps small items, such as keys and a wallet secure. The cup holder stay level even for drinks with the handle bars adjusted at the lowest setting (I’m 5’1) and highest setting (my husband is 6 ft.) Great design overall and definitely a helpful accessory!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install (using Britax B-Agile stroller). I love that the pouch in the middle has a magnetic closure so I don't have to waste time fiddling with it. Cup hold isn't big enough to hold my Contigo water bottle but it will hold regular disposable water bottle or standard plastic/styrofoam beverage bottles/cups. I haven't tried any other brands so I can't compare but I'm very happy with this one. I would fefinitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of eight furry kids

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller organizer. I had previously purchased a different brand but changed over to this one when a friend had it. It has a large compartment in the center I love to use to put my cell phone in or snacks for my toddler. It has 2 cup holders and 2 areas of netting you can put other cell phones or napkins in while traveling. It's made our trips to the zoo so much easier because I'm not having to dig through my diaper bag for snacks and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Red Sentry

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Britax B Agile and couldn't be happier with the purchase! The organizer fits perfectly on the stroller and looks super snazzy! The organizer itself is very roomy holding everything I need it to.... multiple beverages, phone, keys, etc. I also appreciate that the middle enclosure in between the two cup holders is magnetic instead of Velcro. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ninjapanda60Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for your stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a frivolous add-on at first but it is THE BEST! I have a Britax B-Agile and it fits perfectly. Plus, I can still fold the B-Agile with the organizer in place. The organizer holds two beverages and the middle magnetic compartment is larger than it looks. We keep keys, antibacterial wipes, a stroller hook, chapstick, a folded tote bag, a granola bar, and some napkins in the middle compartment alone. Even my non-parent friends have commented on how useful it is (though they thought it came with the stroller and were surprised you have to buy it separately). It's very sturdy seeming and the Velcro is very secure. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: b&l-c

customer_reviews.title: Owned for 4 years and it's still holding up great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this stroller organizer for my city select double stroller. I've had it now for 4 years and it's still holding up great! Still in great condition and does the job great! I use the center storage compartment for my keys/phone and use the sides for drinks. I'm able to fold my double stroller no problem while the organizer is on. The quality is excellent and the velcro really holds up great! Very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this stroller organizer!
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you own the B-Agile stroller. Plenty of little pockets for quick access to things like keys and cell phones. The cup holders are a nice feature as well, but be wary of placing of top heavy, jumbo sized water bottles - just didn't seem stable enough for me with my giant water bottle. My only critique would be the fit with my diaper bag. My bag attaches to the stroller nicely by stroller straps, which pushes the stroller organizer up and crowds the space. Would be nice if they could both fit on the stroller in harmony, but definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMel

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller organzier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my baby jogger city select double stroller. I really love it so far. It fits just fine across the handlebar. It's not in the way when I open and close the stroller, so I always leave it on. The 2 cup holders are great. I do have to be careful grabbing coffee cups in and out so that the lid doesn't pop off and spill. I like that there's a few small pockets made of netting in front. I use that to slip in my phone in sometimes. And the middle compartment is quite large and closes with a magnet. It's very functional and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: lori g

customer_reviews.title: Bad for Uppababy strollers
customer_reviews.text: This stroller organizer sucks. I bought it to use with my Uppababy Vista and there's no good way to attach it to the handle. Also, it keeps on sliding down the handle bars. Lastly, when you do get it to hang right it hangs just under the stroller handle so you can't put any water bottles in it. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install; easy to use
customer_reviews.text: No longer will I fear stopping at Subway on my way home after a stroll through town! I can now carry a full drink cup and my water bottle and still have my hands free to push and steer the stroller or attend to my child, as necessary. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great accessorie!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the better accessories that I have purchase! I have used this on three different strollers; Britax B-Ready, Britax B-Agile and my Joovey Sit and Stand. I prefer it on my B-Aglie. I am able to keep my phone, keys and drink on one side and then my diaper bag that hangs/attaches on the other side. I have not had any issues with the velcro. It's been a few years and it has stayed strong and help up great! I've used so many different types of cups in the cup holders and so far, have not found anything that doesn't fit. Really a good option if you do not have a stroller with a cup holder. :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: great organizer, but not great for my stroller
customer_reviews.text: I use this stroller organizer on a Baby Jogger City Select - other reviewers have mentioned using it on the same stroller. So the organizer itself is good but I don't like how it fits on the City Select, I feel like it hangs pretty low. It's not such a bother that I would think about returning it - I need a sturdy organizer for keys, bottles/water, etc. If you have an iPhone 7 plus or a similarly large phone it doesn't fit as well in there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage - Ripped After A Few Months of Normal Use
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product since our B-Lively stroller doesn’t come standard with cup holders for mom and dad. This does have good storage/organization space for keys, cellphones, cups, miscellaneous items, etc. but the quality of it is fairly poor. We don’t overload it at all, we use it for what it’s intended for and the side of it ripped. For the price of what I paid for, I expected to last longer than a few months. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Unruh

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you have the stroller
customer_reviews.text: One thing we found with the stroller was that it REALLY lacks any place convenient for daily use items like a bottle of water, etc. The detachable cup holder gets hit in crowded places and can easily get lost in the car (comes off when you fold the stroller for stowage). This organizer fixes those problems and besides holding two drinks (bottle for baby, drink for parent), it has plenty of room in the pocket for a cell phone, medium sized wallet, etc. and is somewhat discreet. It also folds up along with the stroller and in the year that we've had it, it has never come off on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: dbagpiper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Britax does it again! Love their double B-Agile stroller and love this organizer. Only thing I'd change is making it a little narrower to fit better (have to cover the button that rotates the handle up and down), and I'd make the magnetic flip cover waterproof for rainy days. Cup holders are nice and deep, the attachment velcro handles are wide and strong (or Diono parent console strap tore), the mesh pockets are nice for seeing my QWERTY phone. Love that the main pocket is a magnetic closure--doesn't wake the kids like velcro would.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T.

customer_reviews.title: So handy!
customer_reviews.text: 4 years and still going strong! This product is durable and sooooo helpful! I buy this for all my friends. Use it like crazy. Keeps my drinks cold and it has a nifty pocket with a magnetic clasp to keep my phone and other items in. But it! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing everything!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Britax B-Lively and love this add-on. I need the room to store a cup of coffee or bottle(s) of water, my keys, phone, a bottle, etc., and this has room for it all! Plus I use the little closed pocket to keep an extra pacifier in case she loses/drops the first one. The stroller still folds perfectly so I don’t have to take it off and put it back on all the time
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kuzniar

customer_reviews.title: ... use on my city select since I did not like the baby jogger cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on my city select since I did not like the baby jogger cup holder. This is a good holder in the aspect that there is a portion that closes by magnet. I rarely use it as a cup holder. Typically used for keys, chapstick, phone, sunglasses holder. My only issue with it, is that on my city select, it tends to slide down as the trip/excursion continues. Nothing I wouldn't recommend for, just an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: SWAGS

customer_reviews.title: A must for any stroller
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our Uppa Baby Vista stroller. It's a life saver since out stroller accessories are a bit pricier. The two cup holders works well for both coffee and milk bottles. The center compartment is great for keys and a phone, things that you don't want other people to see, since it is covered with a flap. The velcro is strong and can definitely hold two full water bottles, a set of keys, two phones and napkins without any signs of strain.
customer_reviews.author: Vu Family

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the stroller and holds on tight and ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a Britax stroller? Buy this. Holds both my wife and my phone, my wallet and our coffees when we are on the go. Great item for the stroller and holds on tight and folds with the stroller, put it on once and haven't needed to take it off since. Hasn't even budged and I've put keys and other things in this and it's got a grip of death. Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy material. Love that you can close the center ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this with our Baby Jogger Summit X3 and it works perfectly. It is able to hold a Yeti 30oz rambler which is a must since I always have it with me! Very sturdy material. Love that you can close the center and keep snacks and things in there
customer_reviews.author: CJK

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Britax B Agile
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well on our Britax B Agile stroller. I like that the middle compartment has a Velcro closure. The drink slots are a bit narrow but haven't been an issue so far. I do recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected, holds most of what we need.
customer_reviews.text: This item has worked out well and I wouldn't want our Britax travel system/stroller without it. It easily hold 2, 44 ounce thirstbusters from Circle K and still has room for a large phone (Galaxy Note 2) and a wallet, and a spitup rag. The hook and loop closure system seems very strong considering it has not ever once loosened. You can even carry to of the above mentioned 44 oz'ers along with one large water bottle in the center phone/wallet holder. Very handy if you are thirsty all the time or if you live in Arizona like us when you have to drink constantly. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mud Maker

customer_reviews.title: I wish I purchased this years ago!  It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cup holder/organizer for basically any stroller, not just the britax. I've tried the $10 generic ones, and they are a waste because the velcro is terrible. This higher priced one is worth it. It doesn't take up space, like the cheapo plastic cup holders that don't allow strollers to fit through doorways because they're on the side. The material is very sturdy, and the velcro is VERY strong. I love that I can store snacks, my cell phone, etc. all while shopping and don't have to dig through my purse often. I'm just disappointed I lived without it for 3 years since having my first child.
customer_reviews.author: avjv0405

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our on the go family
customer_reviews.text: The organizer has two drink cup holders. I was nervous about the size of them initially, but they fit your standard size cups and coffee travel mugs snugly and safely! The center compartment has a magnetic-like cover to hide phone, keys, or wallet. And you still have more mesh and zipper pockets. The Britax stroller we purchased (b-safe) had a zipper pouch with it, but it was large, bulky, and not compartmentalized. This is much better and does not add any weight at all to the stroller nor does it get in the way of it folding up! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jackb

customer_reviews.title: Works for my Pet Jogger too!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Guardian Gear Sprinter EXT II Pet stroller and this organizer fits perfectly. It's two beverage compartments are deep enough to hold my Zojirushi travel mug which is tall. The cell phone holder is a nice touch and I like that there is a covered section in the middle. The velcro closures make it adaptable for the pet stroller and I was glad I could replace the shallow holder that the stroller came with..
customer_reviews.author: SalukiTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Study attachment, holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Fits seamlessly with Britax B-Agile stroller (obviously). I like that I am still able to slip items in the flap pockets on the stroller in addition to the compartments on this attachment. I've used it to hold a water bottle, keys, phone etc while jogging and it held up well. No complaints here. UPDATE: I've even put it on my umbrella stroller and it worked well!
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Dad

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the stroller organizer along with the Britax B-Agile stroller. The organizer is really high quality. The cup holders are nice and deep (and insulated). It's also easy to clean. I love the magnetic closure of the center compartment (which is also very deep and roomy). Since the B-Agile lacks easy storage, I just put my wallet and keys in the center part, and feel secure with the magnetic closing top. The organizer tends to slightly tilt backward sometimes, so I do have to adjust it every now and then. Overall, I love it and recommend. Perfectly fits a Starbucks latte, if you're wondering (like I was).
customer_reviews.author: Ali-Gator

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: My wife an I have the B Nimble Britax stroller and it folds up fine when the strollers folded for storage or to throw in the back of the suv for shopping ventures. Velcro straps hold it onto the metal handles by the handle bars and it has yet to come off, been on it for 8 months or so without issues. The magnetic center part is nice for keys and small items, not galaxy S4s but small HTC cellphones fit it. Cup holders are regular sized fit can and cups but not big gulps lol. Does what its supposed to do, works and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Carmer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well with my B-Agile!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get in the way of my Kate Spade diaper bag, size is great. I love the mesh pockets to put the mobile phone, and the hidden magnetic section for easy access. It is a good size too! Of course, never underestimate the usefulness of the cup holder when you are desperately in need of a cuppa! Other reviewers commented on the cup holder not being very sturdy but I have used it to warm my expressed milk with a thermos cup and even with half a cup of warm water and a bottle floating in it, there is minimal spillage.
customer_reviews.author: effy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our city mini double
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cup holder to hang off our older model city mini double (2014). This hangs perfectly from the middle bar. I like that it’s soft to accommodate a variety of sizes of cups and water bottles with room for keys, phone, pacifiers, etc too.
customer_reviews.author: theyangfam

customer_reviews.title: nice compartments but drinks spill easily
customer_reviews.text: I wish Britax came with a drink holder already installed. This does fit the Britax but it sits at an angle so you can't have a full drink in there and even if it's not full if you hit a small bump your drink will spill. I do like all of the compartments in it though.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: There were several times I tried to take The stroller for walks and had drinks with me. I realized I needed somewhere to put them so I ordered this for my baby jogger city versa. It fits perfectly on the handle and has plenty of space for two drinks , my phone, keys, wallet and I even fit a small water in the center pocket for my dog. hassle love how deep it is. I seriously feel like this changed my life.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: A must for B-Agile double strollers!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I ordered this! I have it on our B-Agile Double stroller and it fit so well! Super easy to put on due to the solid Velcro straps that make it easy to adjust and place! I appreciate the middle pocket and it’s magne closure too! Great product and one you’ll appreciate having! I included a photo sharing how it looks! (I’m also showing how deep the strollers back pockets are for a different review!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Addition to Our B-Agile
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this after we started taking our newborn on neighborhood walks. It works great. There are two cup holders, one on either side, and a small storage area in the middle that closes with a magnetic flap. I can fit a burp cloth and two pacis in the middle storage compartment with room to spare. Installation was a breeze. It does not get in the way of anything that I do with the stroller, it seems to fit in the area under the handle just perfectly. If you need it, get it. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a Britax, you need this. I got it when baby was 5 months old and I'm not sure why I waited so long. It's really the best stroller accessory ever. I leave mine on the stroller all the time and never have any problems when I fold the stroller up. I use the center pocket to hold my wallet, cell phone, and keys so that I don't have to always carry extra baggage. Really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Welch

customer_reviews.title: Fits city select.
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my city select!! It’s so great and my phone fits perfect in the middle pocket. Drink holders are a great size too. Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Squires

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this stroller organizer to go with our B-agile double stroller. It is fantastic! Able to fit in two large water bottles or to-go iced coffee cups securely. The large pocket in the center is plenty of space to store keys, phone, camera, etc. We can easily raise or lower the seat backs without any interference from the stroller organizer, and our drinks don't get knocked or spill. It is a really well thought-out design. We also love that it only goes across half the stroller, so the other half of the handle bar can be used to hang our diaper bag. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: NY_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage for small items
customer_reviews.text: Being a new mom, I thought I had to get the brand of the accessory of the stroller. After seeing other parents' strollers, I realized I could've bought a generic one and save a little money. The produce works. There are 3 pockets in the front, 2 cup holders and in the center is also a deep pocket storage for wallet or something. We use the two cup holder to hold our bottle and the sippy cup. I like to throw my cell phone or car keys in there too. Easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: great for uppababy VISTA
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this organizer. the straps are wide and keep the organizer in place. the pocket is deep so you can fit a lot in there and the magnetic lock is handy. the two drink holders may seem like a lot but you can use one of them to hold the 20+ things your baby may need. The outside pockets are nice as well. You can keep this on your Vista and fold up the stroller without a problem. There are cheaper options available but this is definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Britax stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Britax accessory! We purchased the B-Ready stroller and B-Safe car seat and this matches perfectly. I love the magnetic closure on the middle pocket because it us quiet and won't wake a sleeping baby. It holds our keys and phones with ease, allowing room for BOTH cup holders to hold drinks. Very easy to install and secure once in place. The only drawback is that it was a bit pricier than other similar products, but for us it was the magnetic closure and quality of Britax that persuaded our choice.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaPanda

customer_reviews.title: This has been extremely useful and we can't imagine our stroller without it
customer_reviews.text: This has been extremely useful and we can't imagine our stroller without it! The two bottle holders are nice and deep and the closing compartment (with a magnetized lid) is very useful for stowing away items you don't want to be visible or fall out. The net pockets at the front are great for tissues, receipts and my phone. The only criticism I have is that it gradually slips down the handlebars over time and so I periodically have to pull it up and reattach the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The product idea is great and works well. We had an issue with it tearing on the sides but contacted the seller and it was replaced no problem. We still use it daily and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It attaches very easily and does not add on any significant weight to ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go with my Britax Stroller. It attaches very easily and does not add on any significant weight to stroller. Most importantly it does not affect the collapsing of the stroller so you can just leave it on. It fits two bottles/cups and has a small compartment with magnetic closure in the middle that you could fit a cell phone in, or pacifiers and other small toys. The padding also feels like it would keep drinks cool but I have not tried this yet.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Britax does it again!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Britax stroller organizer to attach to our Britax B-Agile stroller because we wanted more storage space. This organizer is sturdy and holds everything. We have used it to hold bottles, drinks for us, cell phones, car keys, my large clutch wallet, small toys, small flashlights, etc... The middle portion uses a magnetic closure, so we have never had issues with smaller objects falling out. Once attached, it stays put, even when maneuvering over street curbs and other bumps on sidewalks or streets.
customer_reviews.author: JenBen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for City Mini stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted! I love the magnetic center-- I can put more valuable things in there that I don't want just anyone walking past me on the street seeing. I haven't had a drink that doesn't fit in the holders yet although I suppose it wouldn't fit a 32 oz gatorade bottle. I went with this one over the City Mini brand because it had better reviews and boy am I glad I did! I use it for my city mini stroller and it's perfect! I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: lisalund

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for use with our stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT SO MUCH!!!! It filled a NEED and with superb quality!!! It fits perfect on our BRITAX stroller and will get LOTS of use!!! So glad they make these!! Would definitely buy again!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Meier

customer_reviews.title: Love this on my stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on these and saw some poor reviews for other products before I settled on this. I really love it! I love the small pocket for my phone, headphones or keys and that there are two cupholders--one for me and one for my husband! The stroller would be incomplete without it. Easy to install and stays out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: MonMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for moms on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes that it would hold maybe one drink and my phone. Well, it exceeded my expectations. I was pleasant that it folds up neatly when I fold up the stroller. I don't have to remove it before I fold the stroller. It has held a drink of mine, my son's cup, my phone, and snacks and it didn't seem to have any trouble. The material seems durable and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: SCMOM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me (iced cups yes, hot cups not so much)
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. For those who are curious specifically-- it holds a Starbucks iced cup very well and it doesn't spill (I've tried all three sizes on very bumpy sidewalks). On the other hand, the hot cups always spill in my experience so far, so you'd have to use one of those green thingys to stop i tup (and would still have to watch out for the pinhole). There's just enough space in the middle compartment for my wallet and keys. I could probably jam my phone in there too if I needed to; I usually keep it in the second cupholder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would just hold water bottles but I've been able to fit travel cups as well. Good space for keys.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Catherine DB

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product. It provides much needed storage on my britax stroller. It’s also decently easy to clean in you spill.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Must-Have Addition for the B-Agile Stroller
customer_reviews.text: We got this for the Britax B-Agile stroller which comes with a distinct lack of storage. It won't hold a lot, but a bottle of water for a walk and a pacifier within easy reach in the little pouch between the cup holders --- totally worth the price. To be honest it should have come with the stroller in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: M. JohnsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not great for coffee cups
customer_reviews.text: We use this with our B-Agile stroller. Unfortunately, due to the angle of the handlebar, the caddy sits at an angle and any time we carry coffee in the cupholders, it spills everywhere. This is especially bad when streets are bumpy. Drinks that are sealed, eg water, Contigo mugs, etc. work fine, but I often have a standard to-go coffee cup and I wish they worked better in this caddy. Since this is a Britax product, it's too bad they don't account for the angle of the handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: Would buy this again and use for other strollers too. Fits the B-Agile well, has two generous sized cup holders that are also insulated and keeps things colder/warmer. the storage area in the center has a magnetic close top and it seems to be mostly waterproof. We left the stroller in stroller parking at Disney this week and came out to a massive thunderstorm and our cell phones/car key fobs/etc were still totally dry and protected much to our delight! The storage compartment it rather large - we had two cell phones, two key fobs, a sony digital camera, hand sanitizer and other miscellaneous items in it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller organizer! It's nice to have 2 cup holders (as opposed to the one that clips on the side of the stroller), and I am less worried about the drinks spilling if we hit a bumpy stretch of sidewalk. Also has space to hold a phone and wallet or keys so that I don't need to bring a purse or separate bag with me, which is a huge plus since I'm already bringing so much stuff for the baby I can now pack less for myself :) It is definitely work the money!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a priority delivery after the original one got lost by courier services. Thanks to amazon who were quick to reply and act on the matter. Il it fit very well with my britax b agile. 2 insulated holders are very useful. But u can't keep a bottle which has side holders attached to them . Magnetic pocket is very easy to open and close. Enough of space to keep 2 bottles, keys, phone, small pack of chips or cookies for ur baby. And u can keep it on even while the stroller is closed.
customer_reviews.author: zeeshan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy & great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Baby Jogger Summit & I absolutely love it! Wish I had gotten it sooner! Holds 2 drinks, has a nice sized compartment in middle with a lid that velcros shut & has 3 front pockets. Velcro is super strong. I'm an avid hiker & this holds water bottles, keys, tissues, daughter's toys, treats for dogs, phones, etc, all at same time! Highly recommend, perfect buy & great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dog strollers too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a review for a dog stroller that I purchased. The person that did the review was right, it fits great on my dog stroller. The quality is nice and the two drink holders are great, I have one for the dogs and one for me! :) The middle section is great for my cell phone, doggie bags and small flash light when I walk at night. So far I'm really please with this product and glad I purchased it. It works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Siennastar

customer_reviews.title: Handy Dandy
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is wonderful and really comes in handy. I didn't realize what a convince cup holders are on a stroller until I didn't have any. Not only does this organizer give me a place to keep my cup of coffee, it can also hold the baby bottle, keys, napkins, cell phone and snacks. WONDERFUL! All the things I didn't realize I needed (well maybe not the bottle) to carry until I didn't have a place to keep them. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Jeterra T Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Got it on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: Typically with baby stuff, I have purchased multiple items to try and get it right. Not for the stroller organizer. This britax one, even though I have a City Mini GT by Baby Jogger, fills all the checkboxes. Two drink holders. Magnetic latching pocket for keys or pacifiers. Pocket for cellphone and keys. Flexible so it folds down with the stroller without any manipulation. What more could I ask for? Ideal in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Adele D

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. My only complaints are it blocks the child seat from fully reclining. I can get the seat to fully recline, but it always takes some shifting around. We use the lower car seat holder with universal adapter for our chicco keyfit 30. They keyfit will only fit in the stroller with the keyfit handle in the up position, and being in the up position it also conflicts with this stroller organizing. It fits, but again takes some shifting stuff around.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first few uses until it started falling apart. The seams did not hold up near the Velcro and it’s basically shredded now and I can’t use it. We used it maybe a total of 8 times, mainly just putting my phone in it not even a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee I.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize how much I liked this until we took it off to be cleaned ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how much I liked this until we took it off to be cleaned and then forgot to take it on a trip. It makes such a difference to have cup holders and that little magnetic secured pocket where I usually keep my keys and phone. Now I make sure it's always attached!
customer_reviews.author: mindthagap

customer_reviews.title: Works great with our Baby Jogger Summit XC
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to attach to our Baby Jogger Summit XC jogger stroller. It is excellent quality and has a magnetic flap for the middle section which is large enough to hold keys, wallet etc. It also has a mesh outer pocket which is really handy for my phone so I don't have to keep opening up the flap to get to it. My favorite part is that the cup holders are very deep, so when I am jogging I don't feel like our drinks are going to tip over like they would with some other parent consoles.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burnside

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GREAT PRODUCT! Easy to use/get on&off/clean
customer_reviews.text: awesome product! 2 cup holders and center pocket has a magnetic closure. I have kept items in the pockets after folding up the stroller and have not had anything fall out! Also has a mesh pocket on the outside front. Easily velcros on and off. Very easy to clean. I have spilled coffee/pop/etc many many times and the fabric repels moisture. Very easy to wipe clean!
customer_reviews.author: jojotheeskimo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the B-Agile
customer_reviews.text: I love my Britax B-Agile, except for the fact that it didn't have any storage for the parent. This fixes all of that! It fits on perfectly (as it should, since it is specifically made for the B-Agile) and it stays in place firmly. Lots of room in the center console for a cell phone, keys, or whatever your little heart desires. I also like that it has two cup holders- I use these for additional easy access storage, not necessarily drinks- but my iPhone, camera, etc, for easy access! This organizer is a little pricy, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: nikerunner

customer_reviews.title: Great needed storage space
customer_reviews.text: Well built, fits the stroller perfectly. Adds valuable carry space for sunglasses, cups or bottles. No flaws noted.
customer_reviews.author: Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a must have for my Britax B-ready stroller. I put a water bottle, sunscreen, garage opener, my iPhone (to play music) and some snacks for when I go for walks with my baby. When we go shopping I don't even need a bag as I just put my wallet in the compartment with the closure. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hanabi

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO handy!! Having two cup holders is such a perk. The center storage compartment holds more than it seems and I like that it is covered but can easily be accessed. The little mesh pockets also provide more places to store things. The thick Velcro straps keep it securely in place. Overall, I'm very happy with the product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: alk11

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fits many different strollers
customer_reviews.text: I had the city mini parent's console and that thing was falling apart. I hated it. I ordered this and it fit my city mini perfectly. Also it's really durable and I love the different pockets and two drink holders. I ended up getting a bob recently and it fit the bob too (I guess Britax makes bob). It's pretty neat cause I know I can just move the organizer from stroller to stroller. I would definitley recommend and wish I got it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyMaag

product_meta.title: Britax Stroller Organizer with Insulated Cup Holders | Large Center Compartment with Magnetic Closure + 3 Outer Pockets + Folds with Stroller, No Removal Needed
product_meta.description:
The Britax Stroller Organizer provides convenient storage for all essentials while out for a stroll. The Organizer easily and securely attaches on almost any stroller handle and is adjustable to the stroller handle angle and width. Two insulated beverage holders keep cold drinks cold and warm drinks warm. An internal frame provides structure and creates effortless removal and replacement of bottles or cups. The large center compartment features a magnetic closure that won't wake your sleeping baby when opened. Three outside pockets are easily accessible for small items such as cell phones or keys. The collapsible design does not interfere with the stroller fold.

Compatible with B-Agile, B-Lively (single and double), B-Free and B-Ready strollers.

AMAZON.COM



The convenient BRITAX Stroller Organizer expands your stroller's storage capacity. Featuring adjustable straps that accommodate various handle angles and widths, the organizer fastens securely onto most strollers. It includes two beverage holders, a large middle compartment, and extra pockets for smaller items.







STROLLER ORGANIZER
AT A GLANCE:

 * Expands storage on your stroller with roomy center compartment
 * Straps fasten securely to handles and adjust for angle and width
 * Two beverage holders with internal frames keep hot and cold drinks separate
 * Three outside pockets are ideal for smaller items
 * Organizer collapses with stroller for easy storage


WARRANTY:
Limited one-year warranty







The BRITAX Stroller Organizer features two insulated beverage holders that accommodate sippy cups and
water bottles. View larger.





Thanks to its adjustable straps, the organizer can be fastened to most stroller handles for quick additional storage. View larger.




CONVENIENT STROLLER ORGANIZER FOR EXTRA STORAGE
The BRITAX Stroller Organizer makes it easy to take long strolls or run errands around town. It expands your stroller's storage capacity with a large center compartment for stashing extra diapers, baby food, and snacks. The center compartment stays shut with a silent magnetic closure. 

The organizer features two insulated beverage containers with internal frames that keep cold and hot beverages separate--ideal for sippy cups, water bottles, and baby bottles. Plus, the organizer offers small outside pockets to store keys, cell phones, and pocket change. 

ADJUSTABLE STRAPS FASTEN SECURELY ONTO STROLLER HANDLES
For versatility, the organizer is designed with adjustable straps that accommodate various stroller handle angles and widths. It fastens securely to the stroller handles and is compatible with all BRITAX strollers and most major stroller brands. Best of all, the organizer collapses so you can leave it intact when folding your stroller. 

PRODUCT AND WARRANTY INFORMATION
This organizer measures 6 by 13 by 4 inches (H x W x D) and fits stroller handles from 13 to 21 inches wide. The BRITAX Stroller Organizer is also backed by a manufacturer's limited one-year warranty. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
BRITAX Stroller Organizer.









FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Britax Stroller Organizer provides convenient storage for all essentials while out for a stroll. The Organizer easily and securely attaches on almost any stroller handle and is adjustable to the stroller handle angle and width. Two insulated beverage holders keep cold drinks cold and warm drinks warm. An internal frame provides structure and creates effortless removal and replacement of bottles or cups. The large center compartment features a magnetic closure that won't wake your sleeping baby when opened. Three outside pockets are easily accessible for small items such as cell phones or keys. The collapsible design does not interfere with the stroller fold.

Compatible with B-Agile, B-Lively (single and double), B-Free and B-Ready strollers.

See more
feature_bullets: Lightweight stroller organizer includes large center storage compartment with silent magnetic closure for snacks or diapers and 3 easily accessible outer pockets for small items like cell phones or keys
2 insulated cup holders keep drinks and baby bottles the perfect temperature, both cold and warm
Adjustable straps fasten onto stroller handles to fit all Britax strollers and most major stroller brands
Organizer collapses and folds with stroller for easy storage, no removal necessary
Dimensions 6 inch H x 13 inch W x 4 inch D; cup holders 6 inch deep with 9.5 inch circumference; fits stroller handles from 13 to 21 inches wide
